name: Stealth-Based Counter-Engagement
description: Silent and indirect methods for neutralizing PSN control in high-risk environments.

cards.title: Psychological Camouflage
cards.description: Appearing compliant while subtly resisting manipulation.
bulletpoints: Using strategic agreement to lower their guard.
Acting less intelligent than you are to prevent escalation.
Feeding misinformation to disrupt their strategic calculations.

cards.title: Controlled Emotional Shutdown
cards.description: Withdrawing emotional energy to make manipulation unprofitable.
bulletpoints: Becoming unreadable by suppressing emotional reactions.
Adopting a neutral tone to make engagement tedious for them.
Using non-answers and vague responses to kill conversational momentum.

cards.title: Tactical Disengagement
cards.description: Leaving the interaction without triggering retaliation or suspicion.
bulletpoints: Shifting blame onto external factors to excuse disengagement.
Using passive compliance to exit without confrontation.
Planting distractions to create a natural escape window.
